title: Holy Boy Novel Review
partialText: I can already tell <i>Holy Boy</i> is one of those titles that is going to stay with me for a long time. When I first began reading it, I realized I’d need to close the covers or else I’d be up all night following its characters into the most unsettling recesses of their distorted minds.
